front.title: Extension Formats for Unidirectional Lightweight Encapsulation (ULE) and the Generic Stream Encapsulation (GSE)

abstract.t: This document describes a set of Extension Headers for the Unidirectional Lightweight Encapsulation (ULE), RFC 4326.</t><t> The Extension Header formats specified in this document define extensions appropriate to both ULE and the Generic Stream Encapsulation (GSE) for the second-generation framing structure defined by the Digital Video Broadcasting (DVB) family of specifications. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
